models

Enum Context

  • Object
    • Enum<Context>
      • models.Context
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Context>

    public enum Context
extends Enum<Context>
    This enum maintains the context the commands are being called in, i.e. if the command is valid for the phase we're currently in.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vijay

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Command[] defaultCommands
      An array of default commands, available everywhere.
      (package private) Command[] validCommands
      An array of Command objects with valid commands (for a particular phase).
